Author: Sean Obach
Description: A puzzle module where you need to determine a 3 digit code to disarm the module. Tags: 1-5, X, A-F, left-arrow, right-arrow, 3-vertical-screens, 1-small-screen, 1-big-screen, 5-displays
Name: Turing Machine Nightmare
